title: Preparation
text:
Shopping List
Butcher:

2kg Lamb Shoulder (bone-in cut into chunks)

Supermarket:

4kg Potatoes
1 bag (1-2kg) Carrot
Roast veggies
Cherry Tomatoes
4 leaf salad
1-2 slabs of Turkish bread
Garlic & Onion infused oil
1L Chicken Stock
Tomato paste (~3 tbsp)
Sasame dressing (?)
Walnuts (optional)

Herbs:

Cumin
Fennel
Thyme
Bay leaf
Parsley
Rosemary (fresh?)

Assuming there is already:

Corn starch
Olive oil
Neutral oil
Salt & Pepper

title: Preparation
text:
Recipe Ingredients

Turkish Bread

1-2 slabs of turkish bread
Olive oil
Herbs (what should we use?)



Mashed potato

Need to find a lactose free option?



Roasted potato

Potato
Neutral oil
Baking soda
A nicer salt?

Green salad

Large bag of 4 leaf salad
Cherry tomato
Walnuts
Sesame dressing



Roasted veggies

Assortment of: Carrot, Mushroom, Zucchini, Sweet potato, pumpkin, eggplant
Herbs: Thyme, Sage (skippable), Parsley



Lamb shoulder

Lamb shoulder (probably butcher)
Garlic & Onion infused oil
Chicken Stock
Tomato paste
Carrot
Potato
